item.title: symfonos2 - Vulnhub Boot2Root
item.description: Another series I ran across on vulnhub is the symfonos series, which is a total of 6 boxes of increasing difficulty. Below is the walkthrough on the second box in the series. Reconnaissance & Scanning After importing into VMware Workstation and booting up the machine, I was presented with the IP address of the host. This can also be discovered running netdiscover -i eth0 as shown below:
